tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE media_mentions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    topic VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    mention_date DATE NOT NULL,
    mention_count INT NOT NULL,
    sentiment_score DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    mention_id INT NOT NULL,
    sentiment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sentiment_confidence DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (mention_id) REFERENCES media_mentions(id)
);

CREATE TABLE media_mentions (
    mention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    topic_id INT,
    mention_date DATE,
    media_source VARCHAR(255),
    sentiment VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE media_coverage_mentions (
    mention_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mention_date DATE,
    topic VARCHAR,
    media_source VARCHAR,
    mention_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_date DATE,
    mention_id UUID REFERENCES media_coverage_mentions(mention_id),
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    sentiment_category VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE media_mentions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    topic VARCHAR(255),
    mention_date DATE,
    mention_count INT,
    sentiment VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_mentions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    media_id INT,
    platform VARCHAR(50),
    user_id INT,
    mention_date DATE,
    sentiment VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE news_articles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_id INT,
    headline VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE,
    sentiment VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mention_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    positive_words TEXT,
    negative_words TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE trending_topics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    topic VARCHAR(255),
    trending_date DATE,
    mention_count INT,
    sentiment VARCHAR(50)
);
